title: I Am The Music Man (Classic Books With Holes)
features: Magical die-cutting draws the reader from page to page of colourful artwork. Soon the rhymes will be read or, more probably, sung by heart.
description: This Classic Books with Holes series is really popular. It allows the reader to see who is playing what through the box, it is beautifully illustrated and should provide fun and a good old sing song.-- "Betty Bookmark" (10/1/2005 12:00:00 AM)
Children's book illustrator and author of I am the Music Man.
